alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero and southern Bent Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing along a line extending from 6 miles west of Higbee to 24 miles southeast of North La Junta. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Higbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
